description.en: Explore semantic decomposition through vector dimension manipulation. This experimental workflow systematically eliminates parts of latent vectors to reveal hidden semantic structure.
description.de: Erkunde semantische Dekomposition durch Vektor-Dimensions-Manipulation. Dieser experimentelle Workflow eliminiert systematisch Teile von latenten Vektoren, um verborgene semantische Strukturen aufzudecken.

meta.note: Partial Elimination config for legacy vector manipulation workflow. Stage 2 is skipped to preserve original prompt.
